message:
Senior Software Tester  Engineer for Information Technology Company
Location: Cairo

Job Description:

· Preparing Test Cases and Test Scenarios.

· Developing and executing different manual and automated testing to ensure product is up to the standards of quality.

· Tracing bugs till closure. 

· Solid background of testing & related aspects.

· Very Good knowledge of writing documentations using MS word.

· Aware of all aspects of verification and validation in all the software development phases.

· Analysing and understanding new & existing software requirements. 

· Writing or assisting in the development of test plans and test procedures.

· Problem identification and solution formulation.

.Experience within an Agile environment

· Analyze business solutions and approached and develop the proper strategies and their implementation to achieve the business goals.

· Documenting technical and functional user requirements and specifications.

· Reviews and edits requirements, specifications, business processes and recommendations related to proposed solution.

Qualifications:

· B.Sc. Computer Science or Information system.

· Required Professional Experience

· Experience in writing requirements specifications for Information Systems. 

· Excellent communication skills (verbal, written and presentation).

· Attention to detail, tenacity and commitment to full product knowledge.

· willing to travel.

· Ability to work extra hours.

· Self learner.

· ISTQB  certification is a plus.

· Strong problem-solving, statistical and analytical skills.

Send ur cv and cover letter to nohaahmed.proactive@yahoo.com Title: Senior Software Tester CVs without cover letters will be ignored
